each other again? Wonders never cease.

Next you're going to tell me you're also
chasing after <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.

SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>Thank you.<sp:5:0:0> Because of you, there's not
even a single scratch on me.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been looking all this time, and still
haven't found it...<sp:0:4:0>But it's raining now. This is the time to
rest up, pull yourself together, and give
your clothes time to dry.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>The bandit Misko probably felt the same
way, given that <clr:0000>an outfit from their
collection<clr:ffff> is stashed away in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> here.<sp:0:4:0>They clearly had strong feelings about the

SavedLv1_01:

SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>You saved me.<sp:5:0:0> I'll leave the whole
monster-fighting thing to people like you.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're heading for the <clr:0000>Tabantha Frontier<clr:ffff>,
right? <sp:5:1:0>It's right beyond this valley.<sp:0:4:0>I heard that <clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>is supposed
to be in a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>somewhere in this area,
so I've gotten to know the region well.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Haven't found it yet though.
GoRange_01:
